title: U.S. Monetary Policy from an International Perspective
content: For release on delivery  8:30 a.m. EST (10:30 a.m. local time)  November 11, 2016    U.S. Monetary Policy from an International Perspective         Remarks by     Stanley Fischer     Vice Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     via videoconference to the     20th Annual Conference of the Central Bank of Chile     Santiago, Chile                 November 11, 2016
